divs: Sighting DetailsI was a security guard patrolling the Sunrise Lakes (Phase One) residential complex in my patrol car. I noticed, out my left side window, a luminiscent green sphere about 100 feet high, drifting slowly and quietly from North to South. I jumped out of the car, never taking my eyes off of it, to get a better look. It seemed to take notice of my attention and sped up directly to the South on a straight line at an incredible speed, and faded out of sight. The entire incident lasted about 10 or 15 seconds. Coincidently, or not, that day was my first official paranormal investigation of the Biltmore Hotel in Coral Gables, with a partner. Very strange. Also, when I got out of the car to get a better look, I "felt" that it noticed me.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Sunrise
There were no other sightings in Sunrise on or around August 12th 1993
